plugins.photosPermission: Allow A2Display édition to access your photos to let you choose and post them to different devices associated with your account, such as for your profile or custom albums.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow A2Display édition to save photos to your library so you can post them to different devices associated with your account. For example, you can save a photo you have edited or a new photo created with the app.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and post photos to different devices associated with your account. For example, you can choose a photo to display on your profile or share with other devices.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save photos so you can post them to different devices associated with your account. For example, you can save a photo you have edited or a new photo taken with the app.
infoPlist.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: This app needs access to your documents to allow you to select and post PDF files to different devices associated with your account. For example, you can choose a PDF file to share with other devices.
